Uses of Class
co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.TimeoutException

  • Packages that use TimeoutException 
    Package Description
    co.paralleluniverse.galaxy  

    • Uses of TimeoutException in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy

      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy that throw TimeoutException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long Store.alloc(int count, StoreTransaction txn)
      Allocates one or more new (and empty) items in the store.

      When allocating a single item, it's better to use put(), but some data structures might require allocating an array of items.
      void Store.del(long id, StoreTransaction txn)
      Deletes an item from the store.
      byte[] Store.get(long id)
      Retrieves a given data item.
      void Store.get(long id, Persistable object)
      Retrieves a given data item into a Persistable.
      byte[] Store.get(long id, short nodeHint)
      Retrieves a given data item, using a hint as to its owner in the cluster.
      If the item is indeed found on the hinted node, the retrieval performance might be superior.
